trustfund:
TF090221-GEF PPG - CHINA: GEF GRANT FOR
            PREPARATION OF THE PROPOSED THERMAL POWE,TF094204-CHINA THERMAL POWER EFFICIENCY PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Global Environment
            Facility (GEF) China Thermal Power Efficiency Project is to
            reduce coal consumption and greenhouse gas emissions per
            unit of electricity production in Shanxi Province, Shandong
            Province, and Guangdong Province. The closing date of the
            project will be extended by six months, i.e. from December
            31, 2013 until June 30, 2014. This is the third
            restructuring for the project. With the extension of the
            project closing date, the project management office can
            complete the planned dissemination activities to expand the
            achievements under the Project and extends its influence,
            and total disbursement of GEF grant can be increased current
            projection of 96 percent to 100 percent.
